alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 8:58PM CDT until August 05 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 857 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Guide Rock, or 30 miles south of Hastings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nelson around 915 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Nora, Oak, Ruskin and Davenport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
